section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have also for announcement the disposition of 73-6033, Roe against Norton.
And for reasons stated in an opinion for the Court filed with the clerk today, the judgment of the District Court is vacated and remanded to that Court for further consideration.
Mr. Justice Douglas concurs in part and has filed a separate statement of his position.
